name: Project Kamchatka
title: Project Kamchatka: The LeMelon Collective's Roguelike HTML5 Game

warningResolution: NOTICE: Project Kamchatka does not work with mobile devices yet (screens less than 800px wide and 600px high). Please try loading Project Kamchatka on a computer.
